_comment: MSSQL to S3 Backup Configuration - Copy this file to config.json and update values
_server_identifier_help: Unique identifier for this server. Used in S3 path. Defaults to hostname if empty.
_sql_server_help: MSSQL Server instance name. Use 'localhost' for local, or 'SERVER\INSTANCE' for named instances.
_databases_help: List of database names to backup. All user tables in each database will be exported.
_s3_region_help: AWS region where the S3 bucket is located.
_s3_prefix_help: Prefix/folder path within the bucket. Final path: s3://bucket/prefix/server/database/date/table.csv
_aws_access_key_help: AWS Access Key ID with write permissions to the S3 bucket.
_temp_directory_help: Local directory for temporary CSV files during export. Files are deleted after upload.
_log_retention_days_help: Number of days to keep log files. Set to 0 to disable cleanup.
_backup_time_help: Time to run daily backup (24-hour format). Used by installer to create scheduled task.
